actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit Federal assistance to rental housing projects where tenants are not allowed to have pets, or to local governments which do not permit pets in rental housing.

summary.text: Prohibits Federal assistance to rental housing projects where tenants are not allowed to have pets, or to local governments which do not permit pets in rental housing. Permits the removal of any pet which constitutes a threat to the health or safety of the residents or neighbors of the housing project.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit Federal assistance to rental housing projects where tenants are not allowed to have pets, or to local governments which do not permit pets in rental housing.
